title: The problem with bronzies and silvers below silver 2
body:
if they have been playing for a certain amount of time their accs should be terminated and internet connection disabled, but they would still need to pay bills for internet just to be cruel 

and if they r caught using another persons internet the military gives them euthanasia, but if they r able to show their skills in a total of 3 games they may be granted internet access and access to league profile, if they cheat the 3 games by means of elo boost they are burnt to the steak

replies.body: you need some serious mental help.
